class.name: JsonException
class.description: An exception thrown upon a parsing or serializing error.

enum.name: JsonSerializerFlag
enum.description: Bitmasked enum options for the JSON serializer.

value.name: DEFAULT
value.description: Bitmask of 0. Indicates the absence of other option flags.

value.name: PRETTY
value.description: When enabled, includes whitespace in the output.

value.name: OMIT_DICTIONARY_NULLS
value.description: Dictionary keys that have null values will not be serialized.

function.name: parseJson
function.description: Parses the JSON string into a dictionary object.

arg.name: failSilently
arg.description: Default is false. If true, syntax errors will not cause an exception and null will be returned instead.

returns.description: A structured JSON object in the form of a dictionary.

function.name: serializeJson
function.description: Serializes a dictionary object into a JSON string.

arg.name: object
arg.description: Dictionary object to serialize into JSON.

arg.name: flags
arg.description: Bitmask of flags for special options. See JsonSerializerFlag for more information. Default value is JsonSerializerFlag.DEFAULT

arg.name: depth
arg.description: To prevent infinite recursion, this is a maximum recursion depth. Default value is 64.
